caption.title: Distribution of laboratory test combinations across studies.
caption.p: HI: Hemagglutination inhibition; IFA: Immunofluorescence assay; IIFT: Indirect immunofluorescence test; PCR: Polymerase chain reaction; RT-PCR: Reverse transcription PCR; MIA: Microsphere immunoassays; NS1: Non-structural protein 1 antigen test.
